eventDescription: TOSSConf25 (Tamil Open Source Software Conference 2025) is a community-driven event celebrating open-source software and Tamil computing. Scheduled for July 18–19, 2025, at St. Joseph’s Institute of Technology in Semmancheri, Chennai, the conference aims to bring together developers, contributors, and enthusiasts to promote open source initiatives in Tamil Nadu.
eventVenue: St. Joseph's Institute of Technology, Old Mahabalipuram Road, Kamaraj Nagar, Semmancheri, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600119

eventDescription: Join us for our FOSS United Coimbatore Chapter meetup! In Collaboration with FOSS-CIT
eventVenue: Coimbatore Institute of Technology, Avinashi Rd, Civil Aerodrome Post, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu 641014

eventDescription: Flagship full-day event for developers, IT pros & cloud enthusiasts! Dive into Google Cloud & general cloud tech. Expect expert keynotes, technical sessions & hands-on workshops covering AI, ML, & Cloud Infra. Grow, learn & connect. Don't miss it!
eventVenue: Ford Global Technology & Business Center, W67C+98H, Elcot Sez, Sholinganallur, Tamil Nadu, Chennai, 600119

eventDescription: Full-throttle JVM meetup for devs & Java geeks!Code, chill & connect as we dive into Java, JVM, and more. Expect lightning talks, live demos & community fun. Filter kaapi meets functional programming. Don't miss it!
eventVenue: YUNIQ, 4th Floor, TICEL BIOPARK, 5, CSIR Rd, Phase II, Tharamani, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600113, India
